2. **"I heard that if you see 222 repeatedly, it signifies guidance from the universe to focus on your intuition and follow your heart."**
   - Here, 222 is being used as part of a belief or myth about seeing this number repeatedly having spiritual significance.

3. **"We decided to use 222 as our team number for the charity run this year – it’s unique and memorable, plus we love the idea of running 2.22 km (or approximately one mile) through the city."**
   - In this case, 222 is used as part of an intentional choice for team identification in a specific event setting.

Each of these examples fits naturally in different contexts,
